overview: From 2025-12-07 to 2025-12-14, ethereum-optimism/docs had 10 new PRs (8 merged), 0 new issues, and 28 active contributors.

topIssues.title: ENV variables no longer available
topIssues.author: kamikazechaser
topIssues.body:
Previously, there were corresponding ENV variables description to the flags for both op-node and op-geth. Now it seems that only the flags are available e.g. at https://docs.optimism.io/node-operators/guides/consensus-config#consensus-layer-configuration-options-op-node.

Is it possible to restore this without anyone having to run the CLI?

topIssues.title: Depoly a devnet use create-l2-rollup-example  have some warning in op-node
topIssues.author: lyh169

topIssues.title: Update Json-rpc API
topIssues.author: bradleycamacho
topIssues.body:
## Description

https://docs.optimism.io/operators/node-operators/json-rpc

Break into an op-node and op-geth page. The rewrite of the op-node section should be tested on a test sequencer. You should be able to spin up a devnet for this. There is an opportunity here to have a great op-geth documentation instead of leaning on the geth docs.

## Action items

1. Do research on topic and raise any questions with the docs team
2. Write a first draft. It doesn't have to be worded perfectly as the docs team will review
3. Ping @bradleycamacho on discord and request review
4. Implement feedback from @bradleycamacho 
5. Publish

topIssues.title: Update deployer doc
topIssues.author: bradleycamacho
topIssues.body:
## Description

https://docs.optimism.io/operators/chain-operators/tools/op-deployer

Maintain structure, update with the latest contract version and the corresponding op-deployer version.

## Action items

1. Do research on topic and raise any questions with the docs team
2. Write a first draft. It doesn't have to be worded perfectly as the docs team will review
3. Ping @bradleycamacho on discord and request review
4. Implement feedback from @bradleycamacho 
5. Publish

topPRs.title: feat: split json-rpc into geth and node's
topPRs.author: jsvisa
topPRs.body: **Description** 1. Rename the old JSON-RPC to op-node JSON-RPC(as is most for the op-node's RPC) 2. Add Geth's JSON-RPC into op-geth JSON-RPC, and declare the key difference between Optimism and Ethereum **Tests** Now the tab looks like below: **Additional context** **Metadata**

topPRs.title: docs: add Custom Gas Token v2 documentation
topPRs.author: sbvegan
topPRs.body:
Add comprehensive documentation for Custom Gas Token (CGT) v2:
- Feature overview in OP Stack Features section
- Deployment guide for chain operators
- Updated fact sheet to reflect CGT support
- Navigation updates in docs.json

The CGT v2 implementation (introduced in Upgrade 18, op-contracts/v6.0.0) enables OP Stack chains to use any asset as their native fee currency through a flexible, application-layer architecture with two new predeploy contracts: NativeAssetLiquidity and LiquidityController.

Documentation includes:
- Architecture overview with mermaid diagrams
- Deployment steps using op-deployer (with TODOs for specific commands)
- Configuration examples and best practices
- Risk considerations and troubleshooting
- Cross-references between feature overview and deployment guide
